io.o2mc.sdk.business.batch

Class BatchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • io.o2mc.sdk.business.batch.BatchManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, okhttp3.Callback

    public class BatchManager
extends java.util.TimerTask
implements okhttp3.Callback
    Manages everything that's related to batches by making use of a BatchBus and a BatchDispatcher.

        public void init(TrackingManager trackingManager,
                 java.lang.String endpoint,
                 int dispatchInterval,
                 int maxRetries)
        Parameters:
        trackingManager - required for callbacks
        endpoint - URL to the backend
        dispatchInterval - dispatch interval in seconds
        maxRetries - number of times the manager will retry sending batches before giving up

      • setIdentifier

        public void setIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier)

      • setMaxRetries

        public void setMaxRetries(int maxRetries)
        Sets the max amount of retries for generating batches. Helps to reduce cpu usage / battery draining.
        Parameters:
        maxRetries - amount of times to retry before giving up
